name.str_pl: copies of Building Bows With PVC

description: Don't let the high cost of hunting bows stop you from enjoying the noble sport of archery.  The book you hold in your hands details how to use and make a bow out of polyvinyl chloride pipe.

name.str_pl: copies of Lessons for the Novice Bowhunter

description: This hefty paperback book contains all the information needed for novice archers to get started hunting with a variety of bows and crossbows.

name.str: Zen and the Art of Archery
name.str_pl: copies of Zen and the Art of Archery

description: This massive book contains a wealth of vital information for the novice archer.
Will you be able to place the arrow right into the bullseye?  It is not that easy, but once you know how it's done, you will have a lot of fun with archery.
